personalInfo.name: Alejandro Cortes
personalInfo.title: Full-Stack Engineer & QA Automation Specialist
personalInfo.summary: Full-Stack Engineer specializing in Next.js and Django, with expertise in QA Automation and a growing focus on AI Engineering. I build public, production-grade applications with exceptional developer experience, comprehensive testing, and clean infrastructure.

experience.description: Building modern web applications and automation solutions for diverse clients.
highlights: Developed full-stack applications using Next.js 16, React 19, and Django REST Framework
Implemented CI/CD pipelines with GitHub Actions and AWS deployment
Created comprehensive test suites using Cypress, Playwright, and Jest
Architected scalable solutions with TypeScript and PostgreSQL

experience.description: Providing full-stack development services for various clients and personal projects.
highlights: Built e-commerce platform (Baxzar) with Next.js frontend and Django backend
Integrated Stripe payment processing and admin dashboards
Deployed applications on AWS Amplify with SSR and database integration
Implemented modern UI/UX with Tailwind CSS and Shadcn/UI

experience.description: Led QA automation efforts for Xoom's international money transfer platform.
highlights: Designed and implemented comprehensive E2E test automation framework
Reduced regression testing time by 70% through automated test suites
Mentored junior QA engineers on automation best practices
Collaborated with development teams to ensure quality standards

experience.description: Led development team and architected enterprise solutions.
highlights: Led team of 5 developers in building enterprise applications
Delivered projects on time and within budget

education.degree: Master in Bussiness Inteligence and Data Analytics
education.description: Bussiness Intelligence and Data Analytics with focus on data-driven decision making and advanced analytics techniques.
Focused on software engineering, algorithms, and system design.
